title: Fields of Dreams
description:
Mina Kimes & Domonique Foxworth recap a surprising MNF between the Bears and Patriots. Plus, they give their Winners and Woofs for Week 7! They dive into the quarterback controversy in New England between Bailey Zappe & Mac Jones. And is it finally time to consider the Bears relevant? Plus, they give the Chiefs offense some love & as well as the Commanders after they hand the Packers their third straight loss. And speaking of the Packers, Mina and Domonique talk about the struggling Aaron Rodgers, but also Tom Brady. Which one has the better chance of turning their season around?
